name: flightstats
description: "a prospective FedEx program to incorporate flight lookup via an API.Option 1: Guest enters the flight # and date of departure and our system fills in the departure and arrival airports and times. Option 2: Guest enters the airport, dates and time (perhaps via a selection of ranges to capture any changes or inconsistencies) and our system fills in the correct flight #"
author: Feng Ma @ SSSI
